channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Instagram makes teen accounts private as pressure mounts on the app to protect children
item.description: Beginning Tuesday, anyone under 18 who signs up for Instagram will be placed into restrictive teen accounts.

item.title: SpaceX Starlink has 2,500 airplanes under contract after United megadeal, director says
item.description: SpaceX nearly doubled its backlog of Starlink in-flight Wi-Fi orders with last week's United Airlines deal.

item.title: Half-percentage-point Fed rate cut would invite ‘howls’ from Trump: strategist
Jeremy Siegel: The Fed should consider deeper rate cuts or risk a recession
item.description: The debate about the upcoming Fed meeting centers around whether it will cut the funds rate by 25 or 50 basis points. But that may not be enough.

item.title: UBS says get defensive as global growth disappoints. Gives stocks to buy
item.description: As global growth slows, UBS is staying overweight on defensive names, unveiling a list of top buy-rated stocks.

item.title: U.S. industrial production gets short-lived boost from cars
Pret A Manger’s sales crossed the $1 billion mark as it continues to expand around the world
item.description: The sandwich and coffee shop chain said £1 in every £4 spent at Pret is now outside the U.K.

item.title: Instagram to automatically put teens into private accounts with increased restrictions and parental controls
item.description: Meta says it’s testing new ways to corral all teens into the accounts, even if they lie about their ages.

item.title: S&P 500 tops all-time-high close a day ahead of widely anticipated Fed rate cut
Larry Ellison predicts rise of the modern surveillance state where ‘citizens will be on their best behavior’
item.description: Ellison believes citizens and police alike will be under constant surveillance of each other.

item.title: Former Dallas Fed President Kaplan advocates for a half-point interest rate cut
item.description: Making the bolder move of 50 basis points would better position policymakers heading into the latter part of the year, Kaplan told CNBC.

item.title: A possible Fed interest-rate cut boosts home builders' confidence
A guide to Trump’s World Liberty Financial crypto token: Who can buy it, when it will launch, and how the SEC might react
item.description: The former president announced his new blockchain gambit in a Twitter Spaces on Monday.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 10 offers mostly minor upgrades, but faster charging is a big plus
item.description: There are lots of refinements to the new Apple Watch Series 10 such as a bigger screen, faster charging and new polished titanium models.

item.title: Stocks open higher as markets try to predict Fed's next move
